alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Shoshone, Lava Beds (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 31 at 4:01AM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...The Shoshone and Lava Beds area, the Arco Desert, including the towns of Shoshone, Arco, Terreton, and Mud Lake. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Drifting snow can hamper snow clearance efforts, resulting in higway and road closures. Check road conditions and dress appropriately if headed out to First Night or New Year`s Eve events. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Shoshone, Lava Beds
